name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 7: The Cardinal Sins
summary:
Ben Jordan, a young paranormal investigator, is spending Christmas with his family when Alessandro Renzi, an Italian living in Rome, phones him for helping him in clearing his name in a murder where the victim is a priest. Our hero calls Simon Booth and Alice Wilkins, two friends sharing his passion of the paranormal, for help and soon, the trio is investigating the case... Renzi thinks he's being possessed by a demon... Will Ben solve this mystery before it's too late? 
 
Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 7 - The Cardinal Sins is the seventh case in the Ben Jordan series and is a free and independent game which can be downloaded from the official site.
